hrmtb module¶

class hrmtb.TachyBrady(instant_hr, brady_limit=60, tachy_limit=100)¶

Bases: object

tb()¶

This method determines the occurrence of tachycardia and/or bradycardia.

Returns:This method appends the resulting time values associated with

heart beats onto an array called peak_vector.
